publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4308 Alex Neil: Text Independence Referendum—That the Parliament notes the "txt4scotland" campaign of the Young Scots for Independence which seeks to run a referendum by text message to ascertain the level of support for independence for Scotland; congratulates the organisation for this innovative scheme, and recommends that all individuals with access to a mobile phone should register their support for national freedom by texting "Scot Yes" to 60999.

S2M-4308 Alex Neil: Text Independence Referendum—That the Parliament notes the "txt4scotland" campaign of the Young Scots for Independence which seeks to run a referendum by text message to ascertain the level of support for independence for Scotland; congratulates the organisation for this innovative scheme, and recommends that all individuals with access to a mobile phone should register their support for national freedom by texting "Scot Yes" to 60999. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*

S2M-4308 Text Independence Referendum (lodged on 27 April 2006) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Jim Mather*, Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*
